DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the bioequivalence of Azithromycin 600 mg Tablets Under Fed Conditions.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioavailability of Azithromycin 600 mg Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence Female subjects who are pregnant or lactating
